archimate:Requirement.name: R1 Develop communication plan for Security Awareness
archimate:Requirement.documentation:
Develop communication plan for Security Awareness
U17 As all developers, I need communication channel and plan to be in place to enable us to effectively communicate out the work we are doing and ensure it gets used. U33 As Security Awareness Project Owner, I want to increase the of visibility of QSP towards Tech Services, so they can understand our value and our existence is justified.
